name: The Creator (vanzeven, yanzkosim, axelbrians)
description:
A game made by group D13 for Computer Graphics class' final project. Looks like Garry's Mod (but isn't exactly inspired by it).

This project was made with Three.js and some other library. This game features the ability to put basic objects such as cube, sphere, cone, and torus, as well as complex objects like bed, chair (multiple of it), and door, into the game world.

group member:

  • 05111940000009 : Faisal Reza Maulana
